name: GetBalanceSheetReport
description:
Retrieve the balance sheet report from Xero.

Fetches the balance sheet report, detailing financial positions. Useful for obtaining up-to-date financial summaries.

parameters.name: xero_tenant_identifier
parameters.description: Xero identifier for the Tenant. Used to specify which organization's data to retrieve in Xero.

parameters.name: report_date
parameters.description: The specific date for which to retrieve the Balance Sheet report. Format as YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: The date of the Balance Sheet report

parameters.name: number_of_periods
parameters.description: The number of periods to include in the Balance Sheet report.

value_schema.description: The number of periods for the Balance Sheet report

parameters.name: comparison_timeframe
parameters.description: The period size for comparison, e.g., MONTH, QUARTER, or YEAR.

value_schema.description: The period size to compare to (MONTH, QUARTER, YEAR)

parameters.name: balance_sheet_tracking_option_id_1
parameters.description: The first tracking option ID for generating the Balance Sheet report in Xero.

value_schema.description: The tracking option 1 for the Balance Sheet report

parameters.name: tracking_option_id_2
parameters.description: The tracking option ID for secondary categorization in the Balance Sheet report. This allows for filtering or segmentation based on a second tracking category within Xero.

value_schema.description: The tracking option 2 for the Balance Sheet report

parameters.name: use_standard_layout
parameters.description: Set to true to use the standard layout for the Balance Sheet report in Xero.

value_schema.description: The standard layout boolean for the Balance Sheet report

parameters.name: return_cash_basis
parameters.description: Set to True to return the Balance Sheet report using a cash basis.

value_schema.description: return a cash basis for the Balance Sheet report
